metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000006 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
hhvm before 3.12.11 has a use-after-free in the serialize_memoize_param()and ResourceBundle::__construct() functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
